short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click solution to bypass text restrictions on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of websites blocking you from selecting and copying text? Highlight Unlocker is the simple solution. With just one click, you can easily highlight and copy text from any website, even if it's normally restricted. Enjoy the freedom to research, learn, and share information without limitations.
